title: What is the connection between sexual energy and the "method of retroversion" for achieving the elixir of life?
first_phrase: This text explores the concept of reversing the outward direction of sexual energy, known as the "method in reverse," to achieve the elixir of life. The author speaks of the importance of redirecting this energy inward through the power of thought rather than releasing it through ejaculation. The text refers to ancient practices of using seminal energy to prolong life without the use of elixirs. This part specifically delves into the precise nature of sexuality discussed earlier in the text and how one can transform the force of the seed for longevity.
content: « Gli Antichi si procacciavano lunga vita — si dice (ibid.) — con l'aiuto della energia seminale esistente nel loro corpo [e trasmutata] e non prolungavano i loro anni ingerendo un qualche clixir ». << La differenza rispetto agli uomini comuni consiste solo nell'imboccare la via diretta o quella a ritroso » ('). last_phrase: In conclusion, the ancient texts suggest that longevity can be attained through the transmutation of the seminal energy within one's body, rather than by consuming elixirs. While some may interpret this as a form of sexual magic, it actually refers to the conservation of vital energy by restraining from excessive pleasure. The key to a long life, as the wise believe, lies in the preservation of one's vitality by converting the toxic into the beneficial.
